General.Name: Spanish Mountain Gold Ltd
General.Description: Spanish Mountain Gold Ltd., an exploration stage resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the Spanish Mountain gold project, which comprises approximately 50 contiguous mineral claims and 13 placer claims covering an area of approximately 10,414 hectares located in the Cariboo region of central British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Skygold Ventures Ltd. and changed its name to Spanish Mountain Gold Ltd. in January 2010. Spanish Mountain Gold Ltd. was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1095 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2M6
